caption.p: Soil CO 2 production (R soil) for ambient soil carbon ( a– c) compared to saturating carbon (V max; ( d– f)) for the field measurements along the urban to rural transect ( a, d), the laboratory incubation of soils from the urban to rural transect ( b, e), and the laboratory incubation of soils from the nitrogen addition plots. Legends indicate time since treatment addition ( a, d) or temperature in °C ( b, c, e, f). Error bars represent standard deviation. Letters represent significance at p < 0.05 from mixed-linear model followed by Holms-corrected Tukey Contrasts for a and d (n = 4) and 2-way ANOVA followed by Tukey HSD for ( b, e) (n = 5) and ( c, f) (n = 3).
